entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 04:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
